title: MD5 Veteran Innovator Award
description: To provide a scholarship award to recognize outstanding CU student-veterans who have achieved excellence as a service member, student, and innovator or entrepreneur in the College of Engineering and Applied Science at CU Boulder.
marketingContent: To provide a scholarship award to recognize outstanding CU student-veterans who have achieved excellence as a service member, student, and innovator or entrepreneur in the College of Engineering and Applied Science at CU Boulder.
